links.title: Black Friday shopping pulled in a record $6.22 billion in online sales: Adobe
links.description: Black Friday pulled in a record $6.22 billion in online sales, up 23.6 percent from a year ago, according to a new report. The Friday after Thanksgiving this year was also the first day in history to see more than $2 billion in sales stemming from smartphones, said Adobe Analytics, which tracks transactions for 80 of the top 100 internet retailers in the U.S.

links.title: The Week of November 26 is Critical for The Stock Market
links.description: This week will carry great importance because of the G20 summit, and the upcoming meeting between Trump and Xi. Hopefully, these guys can come to some agreement, and the trade wars can end. If they can not, then the only option left to save the stock market is for the Fed to change its stance on monetary policy in December.
